DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study relationship insulin glucose action neuropsychological functioning ( memory , attention , general thinking ability ) person depression .
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Resistance Patients With Major Depression
DOC.criteria: 1 ) Willingness sign Human Subject Protection Consent Form prior enrollment study . 2 ) Men woman age 20 65 year age . 3 ) Diagnosis unipolar , nonpsychotic , nonmelancholic major depressive disorder ( MDD ) depressive episode bipolar disorder ( Bipolar I , II NOS ) , base Structured Clinical Interview DSMIV Axis I disorder ( SCID ) confirm psychiatrist . 4 ) Depression severity define score < 17 21item Hamilton Rating Scale Depression psychiatric admission within 6 month study entry suicide attempt within last 12 month . 5 ) Adequate visual auditory acuity allow neuropsychological testing . 6 ) Stable regime psychiatric medication 1 month prior insulin test . 1 ) Diagnosis possible probable cognitive impairment . 2 ) For woman : pregnancy , breastfeed . 3 ) Personal history Type I Type II diabetes . 4 ) Unstable cardiovascular disease major medical condition , history myocardial infarction within previous year . 5 ) Significant cerebrovascular disease , evidence neurological examination , uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 170 diastolic blood pressure > 100 ) . 6 ) Current drug alcohol abuse . 7 ) History neurological disorder , e.g . multiple sclerosis , stroke etc . 8 ) Use drug may significantly affect psychometric testing , insulin test
